de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api

Interface ControllableMob<E extends LivingEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the bukkit entity class of the entity which is being controlled.

    public interface ControllableMob<E extends LivingEntity>
    The "main" interface to control a mob. This interface will return objects to control the properties and AI of the underlying entity or assign actions. You can retrieve an instance of ControllableMob by using the ControllableMobs class.
    Version:
    v5
    Author:
    Cybran

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ControllableMobActions getActions() 
      ControllableMobAI<E> getAI() 
      ControllableMobAttributes getAttributes() 
      E getEntity()
      Gets the entity which is being controlled.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntity

        E getEntity()
        Gets the entity which is being controlled. This will make things easier for you, because you don't have to keep a reference to the controller and the entity itself in memory.
        Returns:
        the LivingEntity which is being controlled.

      • getAttributes

        ControllableMobAttributes getAttributes()
        Returns:
        the attribute management object for this ControllableMob.

      • getAI

        ControllableMobAI<E> getAI()
        Returns:
        the AI management object for this ControllableMob.

      • getActions

        ControllableMobActions getActions()
        Returns:
        the action management object for this ControllableMob.
